language.switcher.label: Language
seo.home.title: Cyprus Eye Quest ‚Äì Interactive Cyprus travel app
seo.home.description: Plan Cyprus attractions, manage packing lists and tasks, and earn badges with the Cyprus Eye Quest companion app.
seo.home.ogTitle: Cyprus Eye Quest ‚Äì Interactive Cyprus travel app
seo.home.ogDescription: Join Cyprus Eye Quest to explore Cyprus attractions, track your adventure progress, and unlock new rewards.
home.pageTitle: Cyprus Eye Quest ‚Äì interactive Cyprus travel companion
seo.achievements.title: Cyprus Eye Quest ‚Äì Your achievements
seo.achievements.description: Review earned badges, visited places, and experience levels in the Cyprus Eye Quest achievements hub.
seo.achievements.ogDescription: See your adventure statistics, revisit completed locations, and plan your next quests in Cyprus.
seo.attractions.title: Cyprus Eye Quest ‚Äì Attractions catalogue
seo.attractions.description: Browse the Cyprus Eye Quest attractions catalogue, filter Cyprus locations, and plan your next check-ins.
seo.attractions.ogDescription: Discover beaches, heritage sites, and hidden spots across Cyprus to explore during your quest.
seo.packing.title: Cyprus Eye Quest ‚Äì Packing planner
seo.packing.description: Use the Cyprus packing planner to choose your travel season and tick everything you need before departure.
seo.packing.ogDescription: Get a curated checklist for every Cyprus season and keep your luggage organised for the trip.
seo.tasks.title: Cyprus Eye Quest ‚Äì Task list
seo.tasks.description: Manage pre-trip challenges, missions and reminders inside the Cyprus Eye Quest task list.
seo.tasks.ogDescription: Stay on track with travel preparations and complete every quest objective before heading to Cyprus.
seo.mediaTrips.title: Cyprus Eye Quest ‚Äì VIP individual trips
seo.mediaTrips.description: Plan private cruises, wine tastings, and bespoke itineraries with the Cyprus Eye Quest VIP concierge team.
seo.mediaTrips.ogTitle: Cyprus Eye Quest ‚Äì VIP individual trips
seo.mediaTrips.ogDescription: Enjoy tailor-made Cyprus experiences with 24/7 concierge care and professional photo & video storytelling.
seo.carRentalLanding.title: Choose city ‚Äì Car rental | HolidayCyprus
seo.carRentalLanding.description: Pick a start city to see no-deposit car rental offers in Cyprus by HolidayCyprus.
seo.carRentalLanding.ogDescription: Select Larnaca or Paphos to view the fleet, price calculator, and booking with Polish support.
seo.carRental.title: HolidayCyprus ‚Äì car rentals across Cyprus
seo.carRental.description: Rent a car anywhere in Cyprus with no deposit, airport/hotel pickup options, and transparent pricing.
seo.carRental.ogDescription: Travel through Cyprus freely with island-wide car rental, full insurance, and 24/7 Polish support.
seo.carRentalPfo.title: HolidayCyprus ‚Äì car rentals in Paphos
seo.carRentalPfo.description: Book a car in Paphos with pickup at PFO airport or your hotel, no hidden fees and 24/7 Polish assistance.
seo.carRentalPfo.ogDescription: Discover a dedicated fleet in Paphos, quick price estimates, and add-ons tailored to your stay.
seo.vip.title: Cyprus Eye Quest ‚Äì VIP individual trips
seo.vip.description: Design a private Cyprus trip with a concierge, exclusive itineraries, and professional media production.
seo.vip.ogTitle: Cyprus Eye Quest ‚Äì VIP individual trips
seo.vip.ogDescription: Book tailor-made tours, luxury services, and discreet 24/7 care during your stay in Cyprus.
seo.coupon.title: HolidayCyprus Coupon ‚Äì quick Stripe payment
seo.coupon.description: Buy a special HolidayCyprus coupon and proceed instantly to secure Stripe payment.
seo.coupon.ogDescription: Book our offer in seconds with a coupon and secure Stripe checkout.
nav.mediaTrips.ariaLabel: Open the VIP individual trips page
coupon.title: Special Coupon ‚Äî quick booking
coupon.subtitle: The simplest way to use our offer ‚Äî no hassle.
coupon.summary.price_note: One-time payment for the full discount bundle
One-time fee for the entire discount package
coupon.info.title: Coupon
coupon.info.subtitle: Order your coupon today and enjoy cheaper holidays across Cyprus üá®üáæ
coupon.conditions.title: üèùÔ∏è Coupon usage terms
coupon.conditions.rules.usage: Each coupon is valid once per partner ‚Äì you can redeem discounts with multiple providers, but only once at a given location.
coupon.conditions.rules.groupIntro: Some discounts cover the whole group, others just one person ‚Äì see the details next to each offer:

coupon.conditions.rules.groupStay.html: ‚úÖ Lefkara accommodation ‚Äì15% or ‚Äì20% is calculated from the total stay price.

coupon.conditions.rules.named: The coupon is personal and indivisible ‚Äì you can't split one discount between several transactions.
coupon.conditions.rules.show: Show the coupon before using the service ‚Äì on your phone or printed out.
coupon.conditions.rules.combine: Discounts can't be combined with other promos or codes ‚Äì the better option applies.
coupon.conditions.rules.verify: Partners may verify coupon validity ‚Äì once used, the discount is marked as redeemed.
coupon.conditions.rules.cash: Coupons can't be exchanged for cash ‚Äì they are a bonus, not a payment method.
coupon.offers.title: Where you can redeem the discount
coupon.offers.subtitle: The coupon works with partners across the island. Pick a service, share the coupon number and claim the discount on site or during online booking.
coupon.search.empty: No partners found for that phrase. Try another keyword.
coupon.offers.items.noDeposit.title: Island-wide
coupon.offers.items.privateCruise.title: Private cruise
coupon.offers.items.transport.title: Deliveries & rides
coupon.offers.items.lefkaraShort.title: Stays up to 2 nights
coupon.offers.items.lefkaraLong.title: Stays from 3 nights
coupon.offers.items.davinci.title: Cypriot cuisine

coupon.offers.items.photo.title: Photography sessions
coupon.offers.items.tours.title: Island sightseeing
coupon.how.title: How to buy a coupon?
coupon.how.subtitle: Follow these steps to redeem discounts and jump to Stripe checkout. Each stage takes just a moment.
coupon.how.step1.title: Order the coupon
coupon.how.step1.description: Use the link above to pick how many people the coupon should cover.

coupon.how.step1.noteMultiple.html: When should you buy multiple coupons? For larger groups (e.g. a cruise or tour) when everyone should get the discount.

coupon.how.step1.noteSingle.html: When is one coupon enough? If you only plan to use car and transport discounts.

coupon.how.step2.title: Pay securely
coupon.how.step2.description: Use our Stripe form to pay online by card. The process is fully secure and instant.
coupon.how.step3.title: Receive the coupon
coupon.how.step3.description: After payment, you‚Äôll get a unique coupon code. Show it to partners to redeem discounts.
coupon.smallprint: You'll receive the coupon within a few minutes at the email used during payment.
coupon.cta_aria: Buy coupon ‚Äî proceed to secure Stripe checkout
